nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles

Class InfoTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles.Tile
      • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles.InfoTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class InfoTile
extends Tile
    Tile which displays info when the player stands on it. This can't be an itemTile since the info will not disappear after the player walks on it
     

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles.Tile

      • isAccessible

        public boolean isAccessible(Entity entity)
        Description copied from class: Tile
        Specify whether an entity could access the given tile, this might depend by the items collected by the entity. Note this method should not alter the items contains in the collection passed as a parameter nor their properties. Indeed, this method should be given an unmodifiable collection.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
